text: Evan Maureen Ryan (born 1971) is an American public servant. She was the White House Cabinet Secretary in the Joe Biden administration from 2021 to 2025. She was Assistant Secretary of State for Educational and Cultural Affairs (ECA) in the Obama Administration (2013-2017) and was assistant for intergovernmental affairs and public liaison for then-Vice President Joe Biden. In 2002, she married Antony Blinken who is President Biden's Secretary of State. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:People from Alexandria, Virginia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Evan Ryan
